person.persName: Thomas Leonidas Crittenden (Oldham County, lawyer, merchant, and soldier)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier. Russellville, Kentucky native. Married to Katherine Crittenden. Father of George Crittenden. Elected commonwealth’s attorney in Kentucky in 1842. Served in the Kentucky infantry as lieutenant colonel during the Mexican-American War. Served as consul to Liverpool, England from 1849 to 1853. Merchant in Oldham County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the U.S. Army as brigadier general from 1861 to 1881.
